sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "./StyleSheets/JobPostingCard.css"; // Custom CSS for the job posting card import img from "./img/CompanyLogo.png"; // Replace with your company logo image import axios from 'axios'; function JobPostingCard() { const [Job, setJob] = useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('http://localhost:3001/showJobs').then(res=>{ setJob(res.data); }) }) return (
Frontend Developer

Company: XYZ Tech Solutions
Location: New York, NY
Salary: $70,000 - $90,000 per year

Job Description:
We are looking for a talented Frontend Developer to join our team and help us create beautiful and responsive web applications. You will be responsible for implementing user interfaces and working closely with the design and backend teams to deliver high-quality products.

Requirements:
- Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
- Experience with React or other modern frontend frameworks
- Knowledge of version control systems like Git
- Strong problem-solving and communication skills

Apply Now
); } export default JobPostingCard;
